method.name: DELETE
method.id: Delete all data contained in the runtime database.
method.doc: To delete all data in the runtime database, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the database management resource URI. Data removed includes: Authentication Service Session Cache, Authentication Transaction Obligation Data, HOTP and TOTP Secret Keys, Knowledge Questions and Answers, MMFA Authenticators and Transactions, U2F and FIDO2 Registrations, Device Fingerprints, EULA Acceptances, User Session Data, User Usage Data

request.doc:
Delete all data in the runtime database.
DELETE https://{appliance_hostname}/iam/access/v8/databases/hvdb

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: message
param.doc: The time at which the delete was requested.

response.doc: Bad Request. There is a problem with the request. The JSON result describes the problem.
Not Found. The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
